shell.partnerProgramsDesc: Explore programs to join collaborative projects.
shell.needStudentViewDesc: Coming soon – preview the student journey from a classroom invite.

home.heroTitle: Connect with classrooms around the world
home.heroSubtitle: Give your students the chance to meet and connect with other classes from different countries.
home.chatWidget: Hi! I am C2C AI, ask me anything about Class2Class.org!

landing.announcement: Class2Class.org – Connecting Classrooms for a Better World
landing.heroTitle: Partner with us to <highlight>transform</highlight> global education
landing.heroSubtitle: Join a network of forward-thinking organizations creating meaningful connections between classrooms across borders, cultures, and continents.
landing.sdgSubtitle: Every connection we facilitate contributes to the UN Sustainable Development Goals and upholds children's fundamental rights.
landing.rightToBeHeardDesc: Every child has the right to express their views freely in all matters affecting them.
landing.uncrc: UN Convention on the Rights of the Child
landing.partnershipsForGoalsDesc: Revitalize global partnerships for sustainable development through education.
landing.extendReachDesc: Connect your initiatives with thousands of schools across 134+ countries through our established network.
landing.trackImpactDesc: Comprehensive analytics dashboard to measure engagement, learning outcomes, and SDG contributions.
landing.seamlessCollabDesc: Purpose-built tools for managing cross-border educational projects and partnerships.
landing.whoPartnersDesc: Diverse organizations united by a shared mission to transform education through global collaboration.
landing.ngosDesc: Organizations driving global citizenship and rights education
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to shape the future of education?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join our growing network of partners making real impact in classrooms around the world. Your mission, amplified globally.
landing.copyright: © 2025 Class2Class. Connecting classrooms for a better world.

auth.partnerLoginSubtitle: Sign in to manage programs, invitations, and school partnerships across your network.
auth.buildCollaborations: Build meaningful collaborations and bring cross-cultural learning to every classroom you support.
auth.loginSubtitle: For teachers and students participating in exchanges.
auth.jumpIntoTeacher: Jump into the teacher dashboard with demo data.
auth.jumpIntoCoordinator: Jump into the coordinator dashboard as Marco Bianchi (STC Italy).
auth.signUpAsOrg: Sign up as organisation (School or NGO)
auth.signUpTitle: Sign up to Class2Class.org and become a Global Teacher
auth.signUpSubtitle: Join as a teacher or student.
auth.loginPageSubtitle: Access your dashboard and manage your programs
auth.connectingClassrooms: Connecting classrooms for a better world
auth.joinThousands: Join thousands of educators and organizations creating meaningful cross-cultural learning experiences.
auth.accountNotFound: Partner account not found. Please check your credentials or sign up for a new partner account.
auth.demoStcWorld: See all Save the Children country programs and performance.
auth.demoUnicefWorld: See UNICEF country program performance and collaboration.
auth.demoUnicefDenmark: Manage UNICEF Denmark programs and partner schools.
auth.demoStcItaly: Manage Italian Punti Luce and programs.
auth.demoStcMexico: Manage Mexico programs and school partnerships.
auth.testimonialQuote: Class2Class helps our UK schools see progress and stay in sync with partners abroad. It keeps coordinators and teachers aligned without extra overhead.
auth.testimonialRole: Program Director · Save the Children Mexico

dashboard.everythingYouNeed: Everything you need for global classroom collaboration.
dashboard.pleaseCreateProfile: Please create an organization profile to get started.
dashboard.pleaseCreateSchoolProfile: Please create a school profile to get started.
dashboard.overviewDesc: View your organization profile and key information.
dashboard.programsDesc: Create and manage your global education programs.
dashboard.programsSchoolDesc: Join partner programs and collaborative projects.
dashboard.projectsDesc: Manage classroom projects across all programs.
dashboard.resourcesDesc: Access teaching materials and program resources.
dashboard.analyticsDesc: Track your program performance and global reach.
dashboard.reviewResources: Review resources published by partner organizations.
dashboard.myConnectionsDesc: View and manage your global educator network.
dashboard.myProjectsDesc: Create and manage your global collaboration projects.
dashboard.myStudentsDesc: Invite and manage your students and classrooms.
dashboard.joinProjectsDesc: Explore projects you can request to join.
dashboard.viewResourcesDesc: Explore resources you can use in your collaboration projects.
dashboard.teacherSessionRequiredDesc: Use the 'Log in as teacher' preview button from the partner dashboard to view this page.
dashboard.welcomeDashboard: Welcome to your dashboard! This is where you'll manage your partnerships and collaborations.
dashboard.schoolsInNetwork: {count, plural, =0 {No schools in your network yet} one {1 school in your network} other {# schools in your network}}
dashboard.projectsInPrograms: {count, plural, =0 {No projects yet} one {1 project across your programs} other {# projects across your programs}}
dashboard.schoolsOverview: {count, plural, =0 {No schools assigned yet} one {1 school under your coordination} other {# schools under your coordination}}
dashboard.noConnectionsDesc: Schools will appear here once they are assigned to your programs.
dashboard.noProjectsDesc: Projects will appear here once they are created within your programs.
dashboard.noSchoolsDesc: Schools will appear here once they are assigned to your coordination.
dashboard.noPartnerDesc: Your partner organization details will appear here.

onboarding.title: Complete your setup
onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Partner with 4,500+ educators across 134 countries to create meaningful, SDG-aligned learning experiences that shape the next generation.
onboarding.welcomeGlobalNetworkDesc: Connect with schools across 134+ countries. Your initiatives reach classrooms where they matter most.
onboarding.welcomeRealImpactDesc: 47,500+ students engaged. Track your contribution to global education goals in real-time.
onboarding.welcomeSdgAlignedDesc: Every project connects to UN Sustainable Development Goals. Purpose-driven collaboration.
onboarding.typeDescNgo: Non-profit organizations driving education and social impact
onboarding.typeDescGovernment: Public institutions and ministries of education
onboarding.typeDescSchool: Individual schools seeking global classroom connections
onboarding.typeDescSchoolNetwork: Districts, networks, or groups of schools
onboarding.typeStepTitle: What type of organization are you?
onboarding.typeStepSubtitle: This helps us tailor your experience and connect you with the right schools and partners.
onboarding.typeWhyMattersDesc: Different organization types have different collaboration styles. We'll customize your dashboard, suggest relevant SDG projects, and match you with schools that best fit your mission.
onboarding.detailsStepSubtitle: Help schools learn about your organization and find you for collaborations.
onboarding.detailsOrgNamePlaceholder: e.g., UNICEF Denmark, Copenhagen School District
onboarding.detailsOrgNameHelper: Use your official organization name as it appears on documents
onboarding.detailsWebsiteHelper: Schools can learn more about your work and we'll display your logo
onboarding.detailsTrustDesc: A complete profile with accurate details helps schools verify your organization and increases collaboration success by 3x. Administrators appreciate transparency.
onboarding.detailsValidationNameMinLength: Organization name must be at least 2 characters
onboarding.detailsValidationUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.org)
onboarding.sdgStepSubtitle: Choose the UN Sustainable Development Goals that align with your organization's work. Schools can filter partners by these focus areas.
onboarding.sdgValidationMinimum: Please select at least one SDG that aligns with your work
onboarding.sdgMatchingDesc: Schools can search and filter partners by SDG focus areas. Selecting relevant SDGs helps schools understand how collaborating with your organization aligns with their educational goals.
onboarding.contactStepSubtitle: Add a primary contact for your organization so schools can reach out about collaborations.
onboarding.contactFullNameHelper: This person will receive collaboration requests from schools
onboarding.contactPrivacyDesc: Contact information is only shared with schools that express genuine interest in partnering. You control who can contact you and can update these details anytime.
onboarding.contactValidationNameMinLength: Contact name must be at least 2 characters
onboarding.contactValidationEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
onboarding.contactValidationPhoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
onboarding.summaryStepSubtitle: Almost there! Review your information and make any final edits before completing registration.
onboarding.summaryReadyDesc: Your profile looks great. Once registered, schools will be able to find you through SDG-based searches and reach out for collaborations.
onboarding.summaryWhatHappensDashboard: Access your partner dashboard with analytics
onboarding.summaryWhatHappensBrowse: Browse and connect with schools worldwide
onboarding.finalProfileReady: is ready to connect with schools worldwide.
onboarding.finalProfileCreatedDesc: Your complete partner profile with mission and SDG focus
onboarding.finalReadyToConnectDesc: Start building partnerships with schools globally
onboarding.finalConnectSchoolsDesc: Browse schools by country, SDG focus, and start meaningful collaborations.
onboarding.finalLaunchProjectsDesc: Create educational projects aligned with your selected SDGs.
onboarding.finalTrackImpactDesc: Monitor engagement and measure educational outcomes worldwide.
onboarding.finalShareResourcesDesc: Upload educational materials and toolkits for schools to use.
onboarding.previewSubtitle: See how your profile will look to schools
onboarding.previewMissionPlaceholder: Your mission statement will appear here
onboarding.previewTipOrgName: A clear organization name helps schools find and recognize you
onboarding.previewTipSdg: Selecting relevant SDGs improves matching with aligned schools
onboarding.previewTipContact: Complete contact information builds trust with educators

sdg.title: Which UN SDGs do you focus on?
sdg.subtitle: Select SDGs that align with your work. This helps schools understand your focus.

crc.healthWelfareDesc: Health, disability, and standard of living

schools.inviteCoordinatorDesc: Send an invitation to a country coordinator
schools.inviteInstitutionDesc: Send an invitation to an educational institution
schools.pickProgram: Pick the program this school should land with so resources are ready in their profile.

content.uploadSubtitle: Share your resources with your teachers and coordinators.
content.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here, or
content.maxFileSize: Max file size: 50MB. Supported: PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, MP4, etc.

projects.createSubtitle: Design a project that connects classrooms worldwide
projects.hostProjectDesc: You'll actively facilitate this project and collaborate directly with participating schools
projects.createTemplateDesc: Share a project idea that teachers can adapt and run independently
projects.subtitle: Projects created by teachers at your school across all programs.

programs.noProgramsDesc: Create your first program to start collaborating with schools worldwide.

programs.themeCulturesDesc: Swap traditions, identities, and everyday experiences.
programs.themeSolutionsDesc: Co-design ideas and prototypes to solve real problems.

network.invitationSentDesc: We emailed {contact} at {institution}. Status: awaiting response.
network.noCoordinatorsDesc: Invite country coordinators to help manage your organization's regional presence.

resources.subtitle: Manage educational resources from your organization and shared parent catalogs.

schoolOnboarding.welcomeFeatureGlobalDesc: Connect your students with classrooms around the world for collaborative learning experiences.
schoolOnboarding.welcomeFeatureCulturalDesc: Foster cultural understanding and global awareness through authentic international partnerships.
schoolOnboarding.welcomeFeatureSdgDesc: Participate in meaningful projects that address the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

schoolOnboarding.nameValidation: School name must be at least 2 characters
schoolOnboarding.detailsStepSubtitle: Help us understand your school's size and characteristics

schoolOnboarding.contactPrivacyDesc: This contact information will only be shared with verified educational partners and organizations to facilitate meaningful collaboration opportunities.
